title: Statistical methods for construction of neural networks
venue: Department of Computer Methods, Nicholas Copernicus University

A review of different approaches to classification and comparison of performance of 20 methods on 22 real world datasets has been done within the StatLog European Community project [3]. The algorithms that appeared most frequently as the top five were all of statistical nature, including four discriminant approaches:
